Detailed Description

Fields for accessing colors available for a given account.

Colors are referenced by Colors#COLOR_KEY which must be unique for a given account name/type. These values can only be updated by the sync adapter. Only Colors#COLOR may be updated after the initial insert. In addition, a row can only be deleted once all references to that color have been removed from the Calendars or gaia::content::CalendarEvents::Events tables.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::_ID ( ) [static]

Column ID.

Type: INTEGER

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::ACCOUNT_NAME ( ) [static]

The account that was used to sync the entry to the device.

If the account_type is not ACCOUNT_TYPE_LOCAL then the name and type must match an account on the device or the calendar will be deleted.!

Type: TEXT

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::ACCOUNT_TYPE ( ) [static]

The type of the account that was used to sync the entry to the device.

A type of ACCOUNT_TYPE_LOCAL will keep this event form being deleted if there are no matching accounts on the device.

Type: TEXT

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::COLOR ( ) [static]

The color as an 8-bit ARGB integer value.

Colors should specify alpha as fully opaque (eg 0xFF993322) as the alpha may be ignored or modified for display. It is reccomended that colors be usable with light (near white) text. Apps should not depend on that assumption, however. Column name.

Type: INTEGER (NOT NULL)

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::COLOR_KEY ( ) [static]

The key used to reference this color.

This can be any non-empty string, but must be unique for a given CalendarInfos::Calendars#ACCOUNT_TYPE and CalendarInfos::Calendars#ACCOUNT_NAME. Column name.

Type: TEXT

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::COLOR_TYPE ( ) [static]

The type of color, which describes how it should be used.

Valid types are TYPE_CALENDAR and TYPE_EVENT. Column name.

Type: INTEGER (NOT NULL)

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::DATA ( ) [static]

The sync data associated with this account.

Type: NONE

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Colors::IS_CUSTOMIZED_CALENDAR ( ) [static]

Whether this calendar is customized or not.

Type: INTEGER
